Name: Mega Zombie Explosion
About the game: Mega Zombie Explosion is Zombie killing game where you need to survive the Zombie Waves there is lot of Zombies to kill and you need talent to do it. But there is a help many different weapons to kill the zombies and Cool Background Rock Music. You need to Survive long as possible and not to be killed by the Zombies. Features: Good Zombie AI Good recoil on weapons Good Character Controller
